name: Double (itch) (128 bit)
description:
Double is a 2D platformer about 2 blocks, One Red and the other Blue. With 3 different ways to Control them, try combining and then using the controls innovatively to reach the goal

Right now the game only runs in a windowed mode

Use Arrow keys to move

1 to control each block individually

2 to control both blocks together

3 to change gravity of selected block
